channel.title: Posts on CS 4331-002 Team 6: HydroCycle

item.title: [WIP] HydroCycle - Report
item.description: CS 4331-002 - Virtual Reality Project 2 Due: Thursday, April 12th, 2018 Video Demonstration :soon: :tm: Try it out Link to project website with download link goes here :soon: :tm: Project Report We learned…. Game development methodology and procedures Most of the development of our game pertained to tasks that were necessary in Project 1 (i.e. model placement and aesthetic design) More about the Hydrologic Cycle than we thought there was Tools Used Unity :video_game: Blender :crystal_ball: Audacity :headphones: Biggest issues Learning to use Unity and C# without having any prior experience.
